findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow an unauthorized script upgrade due to improper access control or insecure function calls.

findings.title: ReentrancyGuard
findings.description: MasterChef’s smart contract utilizes “ReentrancyGuard” to prevent reentrant calls to a function.

findings.title: Non-Duplicated Check in add Function
findings.description: The add function has a nonDuplicated modifier which ensures that the pool is not duplicated.

findings.title: onlyOwner nonDuplicated
findings.description: The 'mint' function can only be called by the owner (MasterChef) due to the 'onlyOwner' modifier.

findings.title: onlyOwner
findings.description: The smart contract uses 'MINT' function, the contract owner can mint any number of tokens and add it to the total supply.

findings.title: Reentrancy Vulnerability
findings.description: The deposit, withdraw, and emergencyWithdraw functions are marked as nonReentrant, indicating a potential reentrancy vulnerability.

findings.title: updateEmissionRate onlyOwner
findings.description: The updateEmissionRate function has an access control issue as it can only be called by the owner.

findings.title: dev NO
findings.description: The 'dev' function has no access control and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: updateDevTokenRate NO
findings.description: The updateDevTokenRate function has no access modifier specified.

findings.title: setFeeAddress NO
findings.description: The setFeeAddress function has no access control and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: setTokenReferral onlyOwner
findings.description: The setTokenReferral function can only be called by the owner.

findings.title: setReferralCommissionRate onlyOwner
findings.description: The setReferralCommissionRate function has an access control issue as it can only be called by the owner.

findings.title: payReferralCommission
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in payReferralCommission function.

findings.title: name NO
findings.description: The 'name' variable is not initialized or set to a default value.

findings.title: Symbol NO
findings.description: The symbol variable is not initialized or set to a default value.

findings.title: Decimals Not Set
findings.description: The decimals variable is not set, which can lead to unexpected behavior and errors in the contract.

findings.title: totalSupply NO
findings.description: The totalSupply variable does not have an initial value set.

findings.title: balanceOf NO
findings.description: The balanceOf function does not have access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: transfer NO
findings.description: The transfer function has no access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Allowance NO
findings.description: The allowance function does not have the 'onlyOwner' modifier, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: approve NO
findings.description: The approve function has no access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: transferFrom NO
findings.description: The transferFrom function has a 'NO' flag indicating potential security issues.

findings.title: increaseAllowance NO
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function has a security issue.

findings.title: decreaseAllowance NO
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function has a 'NO' flag indicating potential security issues.

findings.title: mint onlyOwner
findings.description: The mint function can be called by the contract owner to mint any number of tokens and add it to the total supply.

findings.title: _transfer
findings.description: Internal function _transfer has no description provided.

findings.title: _mint Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The _mint function can be called by the owner to mint any number of tokens and add it to the total supply.

findings.title: _burn
findings.description: Internal function _burn allows burning of tokens without access control.

findings.title: _approve
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in _approve function.

findings.title: _burnFrom
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Delegate NO
findings.description: The delegate function does not have access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: delegateBySig NO
findings.description: The delegateBySig function has no access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: getCurrentVotes NO
findings.description: The getCurrentVotes function does not check if the caller has sufficient votes.

findings.title: getPriorVotes NO
findings.description: The getPriorVotes function does not have a return value or does not return any value.

findings.title: _delegate
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in _delegate function.

findings.title: _moveDelegates
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: _writeCheckpoint
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in _writeCheckpoint function.
